snippet: A photographer recently took to New York’s skies, capturing go-karts, rooftop pools and the lives inside what he calls “very expensive pigeonholes in the sky.”
abstract: Photographer George Steinmetz's aerial shots of New York City scenes are subject of his latest book New York Air, and focus of exhibit at Anastasia Photo on Lower East Side.
lead_paragraph: A photographer recently took to New York’s skies, capturing go-karts, rooftop pools and the lives inside what he calls “very expensive pigeonholes in the sky.”

headline.main: George Steinmetz’s Aerial Photography of New York
